text:
Instruction: As an expert in code conversion, your task is to convert the provided Jinja template to its equivalent Blended template. Blended is a variant of Jinja with strict type checking and scoping rules.

### Task Description:
convert "contact us" to title case and render it

### Jinja Template:
{{ "contact us" | title }}

### Blended Template:
{{ title("contact us")}}
